code: import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NewRecipeForm=_ref=>{let{newRecipe,hideRecipeForm,onUpdateForm,handleNewRecipe}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"recipe-details",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"recipe-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"New Recipe"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"cancel-button",onClick:hideRecipeForm,children:"Cancel"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:e=>handleNewRecipe(e,newRecipe),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Title"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"title",value:newRecipe.title,onChange:e=>onUpdateForm(e),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Ingredients"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"ingredients",value:newRecipe.ingredients,onChange:e=>onUpdateForm(e),required:true,placeholder:"Add ingredients separated by commas - i.e. Flour, sugar, almonds"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Instructions"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"instructions",value:newRecipe.instructions,onChange:e=>onUpdateForm(e),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Description"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"description",value:newRecipe.description,onChange:e=>onUpdateForm(e),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"image_url",value:newRecipe.image_url,onChange:e=>onUpdateForm(e),required:true,placeholder:"Add an image URL"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Servings"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"servings",value:newRecipe.servings,onChange:e=>onUpdateForm(e),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Save Recipe"})]})]})});};export default NewRecipeForm;
